mapper.select: SELECT name, address, latitude, longitude, (6371 * ACOS( COALESCE( COS(RADIANS(#{latitude})) * COS(RADIANS(latitude)) * COS(RADIANS(longitude) - RADIANS(#{longitude})) + SIN(RADIANS(#{latitude})) * SIN(RADIANS(latitude)), 0 ) )) AS distance FROM esl_schools WHERE latitude IS NOT NULL AND longitude IS NOT NULL ORDER BY distance
